Keywords: Fantastic Four , Power Pack
Real Name: Jack Power
Special Powers
WE SWAPPED POWERS AGAIN?: FREE: If you have 2+ characters with this trait and different names on your force, choose another of those characters. Until your next turn, Jack Power and the chosen character can't use their displayed powers and instead can use each other's displayed powers and range values, and can't be chosen for, or activate, this effect.

[QUOTE=Phoenix_Icewing;12116971]Dont forget two things- power swapping, and captains. Hes not meant to just waltz on up and clock someone. I mean he is, Haha. But combine this with power swapping, say your foe bases a different Pp member- wham! Toss in spidey for perplex; and super senses on all your sidekicks. Jim Hammond, now they're basically untouchable as long as hes on the board, plus leadership and shield team. Synergize~☆[/QUOTE] Unless there was an errata posted somewhere jack and Katie are not sidekicks.

Phoenix_Icewing
Dont forget two things- power swapping, and captains. Hes not meant to just waltz on up and clock someone. I mean he is, Haha. But combine this with power swapping, say your foe bases a different Pp member- wham! Toss in spidey for perplex; and super senses on all your sidekicks. Jim Hammond, now they're basically untouchable as long as hes on the board, plus leadership and shield team. Synergize~☆

Jarosa
Not bad for 25 points. If he switches with his sister she gets an 11 and 4 damage. Sidestep is good and will help extend his reach after his teammate TKs him in. 5 clicks of life will make him an annoyance.

Goop
The whole power pack concept in this set i dont think was thought out well. None of them have any type of decent defense other than julie who just has ESD. The lack of any defense is what really kills it for this team. Jack here will just die way too fast before he can get off CCE.
